extends Activity

      • configureLayout

        private void configureLayout()
        Configures the activity layout depending the User type, the Appointment status, and the Appointment type.
        Parameters:
        appointmentType - the current Appointment type
        appointmentStatus - the current Appointment status
        userType - the User type

      • setData

        Sets the Appointment details onto the corresponding layout view.
        Parameters:
